name: Michiel H. M. Smid
content: Michiel Smid Computational Geometry Lab School of Computer Science Carleton University 1125 Colonel By Drive Ottawa, Ontario Canada K1S 5B6 E-mail: michiel@scs.carleton.ca Al-Khwarizmi and me at Amirkabir University of Technology, Tehran. about me publications teaching: Fall 2025: COMP 3803: Introduction to Theory of Computation Winter 2025: COMP 3804: Design and Analysis of Algorithms I Fall 2020: COMP 2804: Discrete Structures II free textbook Discrete Structures for Computer Science: Counting, Recursion, and Probability free textbook Introduction to Theory of Computation course notes algorithms seminar Michiel's restaurant page Discover and share your favorite beer Discover and share your favorite whisky everybody is sick of telemarketers Rolling Stones, Ottawa, August 28, 2005
